### Create Figure 1 for the paper.md document of the JOSS submission

```{r}
library(spiro)

p <- spiro_example("zan_gxt") |>
  spiro() |>
  add_hr("inst/extdata/hr_gxt.tcx", hr_offset = 85) |>
  spiro_plot()

ggplot2::ggsave("Fig1.png", p, width = 9, height = 7, dpi = 600, bg = "white")
```
